00001 /*===========================================================================
00002 =                                                                           =
00003 =                             MtkMakeFilename                               =
00004 =                                                                           =
00005 =============================================================================
00006 
00007                          Jet Propulsion Laboratory
00008                                    MISR

00010 
00011             Copyright 2005, California Institute of Technology.
00012                            ALL RIGHTS RESERVED.
00013                  U.S. Government Sponsorship acknowledged.
00014 
00015 ============================================================================*/
00016 
00017 #include "MisrFileQuery.h"
00018 #include "MisrError.h"
00019 #include <stdio.h>
00020 #include <string.h>
00021 #include <ctype.h>
00022 
00049 MTKt_status MtkMakeFilename(
00050   const char *basedir, 
00051   const char *product, 
00052   const char *camera,  
00053   int path,            
00054   int orbit,           
00055   const char *version, 
00056   char **filename       )
00057 {
00058   int status_code;
00059   int len;
00060   char *temp;
00061   int i;
00062   char *slash = "/";
00063 
00064   if (basedir == NULL || product == NULL || version == NULL ||
00065       filename == NULL)
00066     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_NULLPTR);
00067 
00068   len = (int)strlen(basedir);
00069 
00070   if (len == 0 || strncmp(&(basedir[len-1]), slash, 1) == 0)
00071     slash = "";
00072 
00073   temp = (char*)malloc((len + 256) * sizeof(char));
00074   if (temp == NULL)
00075     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_MALLOC_FAILED);
00076 
00077   if (camera == NULL || strlen(camera) == 0)
00078     if (orbit > 0) {
00079       sprintf(temp,"%s%sMISR_AM1_%s_P%03d_O%06d_%s.hdf",basedir,
00080           slash,product,path,orbit,version);
00081     } else {
00082       sprintf(temp,"%s%sMISR_AM1_%s_P%03d_%s.hdf",basedir,
00083           slash,product,path,version);
00084     }
00085   else
00086     sprintf(temp,"%s%sMISR_AM1_%s_P%03d_O%06d_%s_%s.hdf",basedir,
00087             slash,product,path,orbit,camera,version);
00088 
00089   for (i = (int)strlen(basedir); (unsigned)i < strlen(temp) - 4; ++i)
00090     temp[i] = toupper(temp[i]);
00091 
00092   *filename = temp;
00093 
00094   return MTK_SUCCESS;
00095 
00096  ERROR_HANDLE:
00097   return status_code;
00098 }
